title: Taylor Swift â€“ Karma Lyrics
text:

Considering the way they acted towards her previously, Taylor isâ€¦ Read MoreOct. 21, 20223 viewers1.3M views109 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguÃªsĞ¡Ñ€Ğ¿ÑĞºĞ¸EspaÃ±olä¸­æ–‡DeutschMagyarFranÃ§aisTÃ¼rkÃ§eNederlandsItalianoĞ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹SvenskaĞ£ĞºÑ€Ğ°Ñ—Ğ½ÑÑŒĞºĞ°PolskiĞœĞ¾Ğ½Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ»Karma LyricsTo learn more, check out our transcription guide or visit our transcribers forumAboutGenius Annotation2 contributorsOn â€œKarma,â€ Taylor confronts people from her past, warning them about the consequences of their actions. Considering the way they acted towards her previously, Taylor is relieved that karma will do her justice and may not be so kind with them.
Karma, as a concept, has been a recurring theme throughout Taylorâ€™s life and discography, especially surrounding her feud with Kanye West and Kim Kardashian in 2016. It was also referenced in several songs on several albums, including â€œmy tears ricochetâ€ from folklore, â€œLook What You Made Me Doâ€ from reputation, â€œBad Bloodâ€ from 1989, â€œAll Too Well (Taylorâ€™s version)â€ and â€œI Bet You Think About Me (Taylorâ€™s version)â€ from Red (Taylorâ€™s version).
On the importance of karma in her life, Taylor mentioned it being the most important life lesson to be learned. One more interesting point to note is her reference to karma on her â€œThe Manâ€™sâ€ music video, with a note saying â€œIf found, return to Taylor Swift,â€ which sparked many rumors about a mystery album Taylor made called Karma. This secret album could be the reason she laughed when announcing the trackâ€™s title (Among so many other rumors).
The songâ€™s mixture of drums, guitar and synth create a declaratory atmosphere, allowing Taylor to list all the ways fate will take its course. As a way of indicating its importance for her, she repeats the word karma throughout the chorus. She also repeatedly gives it different forms, showing the ways it can come back to serve fate.Expand +1102ShareQ&AFind answers to frequently asked questions about the song and explore its deeper meaningAsk a questionWhat have the artists said about the song?Genius Answer1 contributorOne of the themes about Midnights is how youâ€™re feeling in the middle of the night, and that can be intense self-hatred, intense self-love; you go through these very polarizing emotions when youâ€™re up late at night and your brain just spirals. It can spiral downward and it can spiral way up, and you can be really feeling yourself, and â€œKarmaâ€ is written from a perspective of feeling really happy, really proud of the way your life is, feeling like this must be a reward for going stuff right. Itâ€™s a song that I really love because I think we all need some of those moments, we canâ€™t just be beating ourselves up all the time. You have to have these moments where youâ€™re like, â€œYou know what? Karma is my boyfriend,â€ and thatâ€™s it.
â€” Taylor via iHeart RadioHow did the song perform commercially?Genius Answer1 contributorDuring the week ending November 5, 2022, the song debuted and peaked at #9 on the Billboard Hot 100. A remix of the song with Ice Spice debuted at #2 during the tracking week ending June 10, 2023.Who produced â€œKarmaâ€ by Taylor Swift?When did Taylor Swift release â€œKarmaâ€?Who wrote â€œKarmaâ€ by Taylor Swift?Midnights (3am Edition) (2022)Taylor Swift1. The Great War15. Bigger Than The Whole Sky16. Paris17. High Infidelity18. Glitch19. Wouldâ€™ve, Couldâ€™ve, Shouldâ€™ve20.
